import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Review } from 'src/app/entities/review'; @Component({ selector: 'add-review', templateUrl: './add-review.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-review.component.scss'] }) export class AddReviewComponent { model = new Review(1,"","",""); submitted = false; onSubmit() { this.submitted = true; } }
